# capitol-breach-scraper-and-data 

R code & daily GH action to scrape the DoJ Capitol Breach Cases

# Always read in the latest successful scrape

```{r}
readLines("./docs/latest.txt") |> 
  basename() |> 
  sprintf("./docs/%s", x = _) |> 
  file() |> 
  jsonlite::stream_in(verbose = FALSE`) |> 
  str(1)
```
